name: Slime Quest (Shaze)
description:
The shopkeeper is asking for help, get rid of those slimes and save his shop.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Putting into practice what I learned in a unity programming introduction course.

 I did this project because I wanted to get experience on how to do some mechanics for my future metroidvania :)

This is my final project for "EOI Unity Introduction Course"

Contact info:
